input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item specifications and item name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item name:
NEROY Special Design High Quality 925 Sterling Silver Blue Fire Created Opal Engagement Rings for Girls Size 6 7 8 9 10 Or663A

Item specifications:
Material: Lab Created Gemstone / Crystal
Top Quality/Never Fade/Brand New Design , Antiallergy
Smooth edge comfort fit
Pefect fashion accessory rings for many occations,Parties,Engagement,Wedding,Family Unity,etc.Pefect fashion accessory
Gift box included
input_text.Response A: This excellent quality blue fire created opal ring is a great fashion accessory for parties, weddings, family unity events and engagement. It is specifically designed to give you a smooth and comfortable fit while also providing top quality and a brand new look. This ring is made of 925 sterling silver and features a genuine blue fire created opal. This is a brand new design and is made of high quality materials. It is also antiallergy and will never fade. This ring comes in size 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 and 663A. It also comes with a gift box.
input_text.Response B: These rings are set with beautiful high quality lab-created stones.They are made to have the similar clarity and brilliance as authentic precious stone.The rings have gleaming rhodium finish platinum plated over sterling silver. This ring is antiallergy. This is the same finish applied to fine platinum.The high polish rhodium finish gives this silver ring the platinum look. Smoothe edge comfort fit. So don't hesitate to buy this ring.The fashion ring is suitable for any occasions, engagement, wedding, party. Gift box included.
